message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $115 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110.  How about we split the difference this time?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
